name: shlink
description: Shlink is a self-hosted URL shortener providing detailed visit analytics, QR codes, and REST APIs. It can back multiple domains and integrates easily with automation and external frontends.
features: URL shortening: Creates short links with custom or auto-generated slugs.
Visit analytics: Tracks clicks, referrers, locations, and devices for each short link.
QR code generation: Automatically creates QR codes for every shortened URL.
Multi-domain support: Manages short links across multiple custom domains.
REST API: Provides comprehensive API for programmatic link creation and management.
Link expiration: Sets automatic expiration dates or maximum visit counts for links.
Tag organization: Groups short links with tags for easier management and filtering.
Redirect rules: Configures custom redirect behavior based on device, location, or language.
Real-time stats: Displays live visit statistics and geographic distribution.
Import tools: Migrates existing short links from other URL shortener services.
Access control: Protects links with passwords or restricts access by IP address.
Web interface: Manages links through optional web UI or third-party frontends.
